headline: CTI CRYOGENICS INC. CRYOPUMP, 9,000 L/S
keywords: cryogenci vacuum pumps  cryo pumps  cryos  helium pumps
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Cryopumps
specstable:
Manufacturer CTI Cryogenics
Model ON-BOARD 10
Inlet Flange ISO-K 250.0 mm (9.843 in)
Foreline Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Pumping Speed Nitrogen 9,000.0 l/s (19,071.8 CFM)
Pumping Speed Water Vapor 9,000.00 l/s (19,071.84 CFM)
Pumping Speed Argon 2,500.00 l/s (5,297.73 CFM)
Pumping Speed Air 3,000.00 l/s (6,357.28 CFM)
Pumping Capacity--Argon 2,000.00 l/s (4,238.19 CFM)
Pumping Capacity--Hydrogen 24.00 l/s (50.86 CFM)
Pumping Speed Hydrogen 5,000.00 l/s (10,595.47 CFM)
Cooldown Time 90 Minutes
Accessories

Included with pump:

  • TC guage
  • Roughing pump valve
  • Purge valve
  • Pressure relief valve
  • Microprocessor controller
Other Information

P/N 8116083G001

Remote control pad is NOT included, sold separately- http://www.capovani.com/iinfo.cfm?ItemNo=49424

Exterior Dimensions
Width 14.000 in (35.6 cm)
Height 26.000 in (66.0 cm)
Weight 105 lb (48 kg)
